title: The Fabulous Five
description: Discover which of the Fabulous Five personality types matches you best.

answers.text: Hit the trail or try something new outdoors
Organize a get-together or lead a project
Make something with your hands or express yourself
Help someone out or spend time with close friends

questions.text: When a problem comes up, you usually:

answers.text: Jump in and try a solution right away
Step back and think it through first
Take charge and delegate if needed
Look for a creative or unusual approach
Ask others what they need and pitch in

questions.text: Your friends would say you're the one who:

answers.text: Always has the next adventure planned
Has the random facts and deep answers
Gets everyone on the same page
Brings the ideas and the vibe
Makes people feel heard and supported

results.description: You thrive on new experiences and the great outdoors. Life is an adventure waiting to happen.
You love learning and digging into ideas. Curiosity drives you, and you enjoy solving puzzles.
You naturally step up and bring people together. You're the one others look to when things need to get done.
You see the world through a creative lens. Making things and expressing yourself is how you connect with life.
You care deeply about people and relationships. You're the friend everyone counts on.
